document.full_text: allstate corp  said it suffered $1.4 billion in catastrophe losses from april tornadoes, and the largest publicly traded u.s. home and auto insurer said it will now make a regular practice of releasing such loss figures.
document.title: allstate puts its april storm losses at $1.4 billion
lines_and_colors: allstate corp  said it suffered $1.4 billion in catastrophe losses from april tornadoes, and the largest publicly traded u.s. home and auto insurer said it will now make a regular practice of releasing such loss figures.
